description: Whitelist configuration for bot command permissions. Master player always has full access to all bots.

Aron_123.description: Example: Limited access to Subject_9-17 only

FriendPlayer.description: Example: Can command RogueW0lfy and L@b_R4t with basic commands

notes.allowedBots: List of bot names this player can command. Use ['*'] for all bots.
notes.allowedCommands: List of commands this player can use. Use ['*'] for all commands.
notes.master: The master player (defined in config.json) always has full access to all bots and all commands.
